title: Research Officer - Strategic Technology (Walk-in Drive)
tagsAndSkills: Literature Search,Literature Survey,reaxys,Synthesis,strategic technology,Organic Synthesis,Organic Chemistry,Literature
jobDescription:
Job Purpose

- Electronic Laboratory Notebook administration. - Literature survey. - Supervision of laboratory operation. - Ensuring laboratory safety and compliance.

Job Responsibilities

- Lead electronic laboratory notebook (ELN) software administration and management. Provide ELN traninigs to new joinees. Connect with third party and internal stakeholders on regular basis for implementation and troubleshooting.

- Literature survey as per order forms. - Supervision of experimental work in laboratory. - Ensure laboratory safety and compliances

- Ensure availability of raw materials and equipment required for the execution of experimental planning

- Understand the safety aspects of all reactions and chemicals to be used in laboratory - Play the role of ERT and shift incharge - Perform night duties as per site philosophy

-To ensure 100% compliance on ERA and zero safety incidents in lab

- Laboratory management: disposal of samples, disposal of chemical waste, chemical inventory - Equipment maintenance: ensure PM of allocated instruments and inventory of spares

- Chemdraw Scifinder, Reaxys, Orbit Patent and research article reading habit Strong chemistry background Synthesis chemistry

title: Lead     Network   Security
companyName: Star Union Dai ichi Life Insurance (SUD Life)

ambitionBoxData.Title: Star Union Dai-ichi Life Insurance Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Lead Network Security:

Designation: Manager Network

Reporting to: Sr. Manager Network

Grade : Manager M07

Department: IT Infrastructure & Security

Location: Navi Mumbai, Vashi

Job Responsibilities:

Role is responsible and accountable for leading a team of professionals handling overall Network Infrastructure operations at Data Centre & Branches including network security operations.

Leadership oversight availability for 24x7 support.

Manage, implement, govern and improve processes and controls to assure expected service quality / SLA / Uptime.

Monthly Executive or MIS Reports / Dashboards

Responsible to ensure compliance to timely closure of audit points and various compliance adherence. Face internal and external audits.

Conferring with network users about solving existing system problems.

Security troubleshooting like Firewall port opening, VPN, Web Proxy issues etc.

Raising Purchase requesting / approving Service provider invoices etc.

Responsible for talent lifecycle, mentoring and motivating.

Focus on continuous service improvement, identify, and undertake optimisation and improvement activities for cost or effort gains

Analyse technology and industry trends in the Network and security area, and develop future strategies, technology adoptions, processes changes for improving services and optimising costs.

Responsible for evaluating partners, suppliers and product evaluations, decision making, terms of engagement

Partner/Supplier regular review and governance

Key Skills:

Handled large scale critical Network and security infrastructure, preferably in BFSI domain

Hands-on Knowledge of various networking technologies: Routing protocols preferably BGP, OSPF, EIGRP, QoS, HSRP etc., ; Cloud technologies preferably Azure, Switching technologies preferably STP, VTP, NTP etc; Protocol Stacks preferably TCP/IP, UDP, etc; Load Balancers preferably F5, Citrix, Array etc; Network firewalls including WAF, preferably Palo Alto, FortiGate, Cisco etc; VPN technologies preferably Ipsec/VPN, SSL, DMVPN, GETVPN, Site To Site, Fortinet Global Protect etc; NAC technologies preferably Cisco ISE; Wireless networks; WAN Optimisers preferably Riverbed; Monitoring tools preferably SolarWinds, DynaTrace, Web Proxy gateway, SD-WAN

Quick learner and open for change in technologies

Leadership and organisational skills to achieve required outcomes

Collaboration skills to achieve a win-win and best solution

Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Proven ability to handle pressure situations, accurate information dissipation, and resolve the situation in the quickest time

Excellent problem solving skills

Qualifications and Technical Skills:

Diploma / bachelors degree in information technology related field of study with a network engineering focus.

CCNP Security

Palo Alto, FortiGate, F5, Citrix Cloud Certifications

ITIL, PMP

title: C + + Android / IOS Developer
tagsAndSkills: home automation,C++,Backend,Mobile development,Agile scrum,Silicon,ios development,Continuous improvement
jobDescription:
• Design and develop high-performance, cross-platform applications using C++ for Android and iOS platforms.
  • Implement and maintain features using Android NDK and iOS development frameworks.
  • Collaborate with the mobile development team to integrate C++ code with Java, Kotlin, Swift, and Objective-C.
  • Ensure the applications meet the highest quality, performance, and security standards.
  • Stay current with industry trends and best practices in mobile app development.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to the continuous improvement of the development process.
  • Work closely with backend developers to integrate RESTful APIs and backend services.
  • Follow Agile/Scrum development methodologies to deliver high-quality software promptly.
